content.text:
Event : Wind Advisory
Area: Keweenaw; Houghton
Severity : Moderate
Description: * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph becoming
west tonight. A few gusts to 50 mph are possible this afternoon.

* WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Instructions: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high
profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

Secure outdoor objects.
